description:
With Kenshiro finally joining forces with the North Star Army, everyone in the army feels strongly reassured. In the meantime, reports of Kenshiro reach the area commander Geira. Ein, a bounty hunter coming to claim a bounty, hears from Geira that the price on Kenshiro`s head is staggering, boasts loudly that he`ll defeat him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein, le mystérieux mercenaire : « J`aurai la peau de Kenshiro ! »
Nazo no Shoukin Kasegi Ein! Ore ga Kenshirou no Kubi o Toru!!
The Mysterious Bounty Hunter, Ein! Kenshiro`s Head Is Mine!!
謎の賞金稼ぎアイン! 俺がケンシロウの首をとる!
